cont.entity_a: Improves photo quality significantly. Incredibly sharp photographs. Issues with blue tint in photos; requires adjustments.
cont.entity_b: Produces sharp, saturated, and color-accurate images. Matched only by the best optics for sharpness and contrast.

cont.entity_a: Autofocus not supported on Nikon D5600; requires AF-S lens. No internal AF motor; manual focus required on certain cameras. AF works well on cameras with inbuilt motor. Noisy focus but not a concern for still photography.
cont.entity_b: Focus can hunt at close range on non-contrasty subjects. Slow autofocus but sharp images. Heavy and slow focusing is a drawback.

cont.entity_a: Built like a tank but lightweight due to plastic construction. Optical quality is high despite plastic build.
cont.entity_b: Extremely sharp and solidly built. Heavy and cumbersome for handheld use.

cont.entity_a: Requires manual focus on DX cameras without a focusing motor. Easy transition from automatic to manual shooting.
Compatible with a wide range of Nikon cameras.
Great for portraits and close-up work with beautiful depth of field.
cont.entity_b: Excellent for portraits with great clarity and blur.
Good value for the money compared to other high-end lenses.
Heavy and cumbersome for handheld use.
Fantastic macro lens for Canon. Manual focus recommended for macro. Ideal for macro and portrait photography.
No image stabilization; handheld macro shots difficult. Performs well with extension tubes for specific photography needs.
Arrived on time and in excellent condition.
